alert.note: Alert for Grimes; Harris; Montgomery; Walker; Waller (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 12:43AM CDT until June 04 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Grimes County in southeastern Texas... Montgomery County in southeastern Texas... Northeastern Waller County in southeastern Texas... South central Walker County in southeastern Texas... North central Harris County in southeastern Texas... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1243 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles northeast of Anderson to 6 miles west of Montgomery to near Todd Mission to Hockley, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Conroe, Tomball, Willis, Pinehurst, The Woodlands, Spring, Oak Ridge North, Panorama Village, Shenandoah, Magnolia, Cut And Shoot, New Waverly, Montgomery, Stagecoach, Woodloch, Todd Mission, The Woodlands Pavillion, Chateau Woods, Lake Conroe Dam and Hooks Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
